newsitem.title: USA: Storm Tech to seek dismissal of lawsuit.
newsitem.headline: Storm Tech to seek dismissal of lawsuit.

text.p: Storm Technology Inc said on Friday it will seek the dismissal of a lawsuit accusing the company of violations of federal securities laws.
The lawsuit, filed in a Superior Court in Santa Clara County in March, alleges violations in connection with the company's initial public offering in October 1996, the company said.
"We believe the lawsuit is without merit, and we will vigorously defend against it," said L. William Krause, president and chief executive officer.
Lawyers for the plaintiffs were not immediately available for comment.
Storm Technology provides digital pohoto solutions that enable consumers and small businesses to input, store, organize, enhance and use photos in their personal computers.
